Replies.Reply: Super: OCTOBER 9, 1944, SCOTLAND.
smashing through glass and steel and raining sparks. Landing inside with a ROAR!!! --
Dozens of HELLBOY clippings flash by: tabloid headlines along with intimate images of Hellboy as a KID. H.B. at 7, at 12, dressed as a human for Halloween, Broom by his side.
Abe pulls off his breathing apparatus. Activates the locator on his utility belt. Hellboy does likewise. BEEEP! The devices synchronize.
They crash through pipes, wiring and ducts and slide off down a duct and into --
Hellboy approaches Sammael, whose remains are wreathed in BLACK flame. A huge CROWD looks on from the end of the platform.
Is he real? Oh yeah -- Absolutely.
I haven't talked about it for years, you know?
Everyone called me crazy...
But I have the negative.
Corps photographer aboard an allied submarine...
and no one has ever seen it. They keep saying he's not real, but I want to set the record straight before I go.
Here. The real picture, not the retouched one in LIFE magazine.
This is him. The very same night we found him. The night Broom gave him that name.
Can I say it on TV? He called him --
-- Broom! Topside, now.
The sooner we're done, the better.
Oh -- you don't wanna know what I think. Topside, now.
What is it?
You are a Catholic??
Here. You'll need one of these.
Three days too late for that one, "professor."
You're wasting our time: There's nothing on this island but sheep and rocks.
What a load of crap. Hell, a week ago I hadn't even heard the word parabnormal --
Half transmission. Nonsense -- German ghost stories!
Oh, I'll bet you have.
The freak in the gas mask --
Air and sea backup. What's closest?
Listen to me, you moron: you do that again, I'll carve you a new --
From where??!!
What are you two talking about??
Sweet Jesus.
It's almost over!!
Do you believe in hell?
Grigory -- That's Russian, right?
Thought they were on our side...
C'mon -- Rasputin??
That makes him more than a hundred --
What the hell was that? An ape?
A red ape.
It's got a big stone -- in its hand --
Londonderry, sir. Forty minutes away.
No matter what happens to me, you must carry on with the work.
Yes, you will... Leave me. Deny me.
This will guide you back to me.
I grant you everlasting life, youth and the power to serve me.
There will be no failure, General. I promised Herr Hitler a miracle. I'll deliver one.
Ragnarok, Anung Ia Anung.
All grown up, I see.
I sang the first lullaby you ever heard, my child. I ushered you into this world.
I alone know your true calling, your true name.
I can see that you're still young and don't know your place.
Teach him.
Sammael has fulfilled his destiny...
The child will be there. And so will we all -- Won't we?
Ready the welcome, my love --
Salt. Gathered from the tears of a thousand martyrs. Restraining the essence of Sammael, the hell hound, the seed of destruction.
The Master is calling your name now, my girl. We are all part of his plan. You must return to the child... So, once again...
...dream of fire.
Very good, Professor Broom.
His destiny.
You raised the child. Nurtured him. So, In return... Would you permit me? A brief, brief glimpse? Of the future --
If only you had him destroyed sixty years ago, none of this would come to pass. But, then, how could you have known?
Your God chooses to remain silent. Mine lives within me.

In the frozen waters of the Malaya Nevka, in the darkness of the void: every time I died and crossed over, a little more of the Master came back with me. He disclosed to me the child's true name... Would you like to know it??
Grief and revenge...
Rebirth? I like that.
Now, finally, it's mine.
Enjoy the bright metal you've earned. There will be no further transactions.
Only closure.
"And I looked and beheld an Angel, and in his hand the key to the bottomless pit..."
These were the words I heard as a peasant boy in Tobolsk. And now, the door -- Sent by the Ogdruh Jahad so that they might at long last enter our world.
No?
In exchange for her life then, open the door.
As you wish.
She's dead.
Her soul awaits on the other side. If you want her back...
Open the door and claim her.
Names hold the power and nature of things. Mine for example. Rasputin: "The crossroads."
And crossroads I have become.
Your true name: Anung-un-Rama. Repeat it. Become the key.
The final seal. Open it!
You will never fulfill your destiny. You will never understand the power inside you.
Child...
Look what you've done --
You've killed me -- an insignificant man... but you have brought forth a God.
Behold, my master, Behemoth. Guardian of thresholds, destroyer of worlds.
I will not leave you.
Never --
More Power!! Don't let the level drop!!
Grigory!
Your eyes. What did they do to your eyes?
Only seven more days to the eclipse, Grishka...
Move.
He is aware.
You are the key! The right hand of doom!
What did you think it was made for? Open the locks.
Silence!!
Imagine it: An eden for you and her --
Hell will hold no surprises for us.
It's time.
Five years of research and construction, Grigory. Five years!!
The furhrer doesn't look kindly on failure.
Tonight, We will open a portal and awaken the OGDRU JAHAD: The seven Gods of chaos.
Our enemies will be destroyed. In an instant, all impurity in this world will be razed and from the ashes a new eden will arise.
Bread crumbs on the trail. Like in a fable. They both distract him and guide him exactly where I need him.
Jesus! would'ya look at the size of that whammer!
Look at that. That's a costume. These people amaze me.
That word -- conceal --

-- Defense, right, well -- I'm here to clear up this once and for all.
There-is-no-such-thing.
With their conveniently blurry footage of their beloved "Hellboy." And they claim that he works for the FBI-?

Every time the media get a look at him, they come to me. I'm running out of lies, Trevor.
I do.

Your "guest" happens to be six foot five, bright red, and is government funded.

See what??
Is he serious??
Oooh!! Who was here? Nixon? Houdini? You mind sharing your mystic insights?

That's what you do. That's why we need you. You have an insight.
You know monsters.
In the end, after you've killed and captured every freak out there -- there's still one left: you.
I want that thing locked up, starting now -- Now!!! You hear me??!!

fields, fifty miles from Moscow. We leave as soon as we get clearance and equipment --

But I'll be in charge this time. Either we wrap this up or I'm closing this freak show for good.

Each of us gets a belt.

Forget it. This is practically a city. And it stinks, and it's muddy. We'll go back, check into a hotel, regroup after breakfast. We'll have to make a grid, go by quadrants. Maybe satellite photography.
What's that --
We should go back -- you -- you could tear that door apart --
-- should go back. Now!
I'm in charge. We go back!
Ouch!!
Well, it's not that big a fall...

You never, ever light a cigar that way.
Use a wooden match. It preserves the flavor.
Thank you.

Have you told him yet?

My arm is fine. Where are you??
Where are you???
Wait -- Wait -- You can't go anywhere -- I gotta go with you --
No. Stop. Don't do this -- Listen to me -- Tell me where you are --
Yes?
Sir, may I go first??
C'mon, time to go home. Tape you up.
No. I never was.
You want me to hold him down?
Down there. Did you ever loose track of him?
I'm in way over my head, I know that much.
No, I'm not. He respects Clay. Not me. I don't know why you chose me, Sir. But I'm not qualified.
Oh, please. I'm not "pure of heart."
Professor, that girl you were talking about --
I think I can help -- Talk to her -- I can bring her back.
Hostage negotiations.
Miss Sherman? I'm Agent Myers, FBI.
Miss Sherman? I'm Agent Myers, FBI.
The hospital called us. They don't feel they're capable of caring for you any longer, and --
Liz -- can I call you Liz? It's a beautiful name --
It's still impressive by my standards: My name's John.
Dr. Broom asked me to invite you back to the Bureau. No special precautions, no security escorts. You and me in a taxi. Like regular folks.
Miss Sherman, he's asking you back, but it's entirely your choice.
Hey!! The music!! Turn down the music!!
Jesus! That's not -- That's not safe, Miss Sherman -- Miss Sherman?
Nice view --
A smile, huh? That's good.
I'll get you a fresh pack.

Strong.

Alone?
-- Late. Five minutes late.
-- Section fifty-one. Step back.

Watch your hands and elbows.

Over here... if you don't mind?
Story of my life.

Behind this door. A dark entity -- Evil, ancient and hungry.
Red, I found something --
There's not much here: the entity's name is Sammael, the desolate one, son of Nergal --
No, listen this: Sammael, the desolate one, lord of the shadows, son of Nergal --
I need to touch it to "see"...
The past, the future, whatever this object holds.
Don't worry about fingerprints. I never had any.
They were over here, Professor.
Professor..? You -- are very sick --
You were burned by some organic acid.
Red. How long was it latched onto you?
Professor...
Touched you five seconds. Laid three eggs.
The eggs are very sensitive to heat and light. They need a humid, dark environment to breed.
Yes, you are.
There's a pulse. And it's coming from --
there --
cistern on the other side. Most of the eggs are there --
I'm glad I'm not human. This place would be an embarrassment.
Remind me why I keep doing this.
Oh, right --
Listen -- I'm not much of a problem solver...
Three decades and I've only gotten two sides.
But I know this much: if there's trouble -- all we have is each other. And I'm stuck here.
So -- Take care of the big monkey for me, will you?
They're not speaking. Professor Broom had him grounded.
Okay. You saw the fish man, right?
Well, come on in and meet the rest of the family.
He gets fed six times a day. He's got a thing for cats. You'll be his nanny, his keeper, his best friend. He never goes out unsupervised --
Yup. Sixty years old by our count. But he doesn't age like we do -- think dog years: He's barely out of his teens.
It'll fill in. Where do you want your dinner, Red? By the couch?
Agent Myers is your new liaison.
Nah. I'll be around, Red, just back in the field.
Manning says I'm too soft on you --
The candy. Give him the candy.
Well, you did break out --
It is. You got yourself on TV again.
Try not to stare. He hates when people stare.
His horns. He files 'em. To "fit in."
We're on the move.
Seal the doors. Red and Blue are coming in.
Okay, boys, let's synch up our locators.
dead --

Red's on the move!! I'll cover him!!
Damn it, Red.

Got tired of me?

Still angry?

It's nobody's business.

C'mon, Champ! Happy Halloween!!! You're taking me for a walk!

I break it, they see us, Happy Halloween. No more hiding.
Outside. I could be outside --
Don't get psychic with me.
We don't take hints.
Hold on -- hold on -- I thought we checked this place. Fakes, and reproductions.
Father...?
Who wards off demons.
Reliquary --
Would'ya look at this babies? Made 'em myself. Holy water, silver shavings, white oak: the works.

Blue: It stinks in here -- Finely aged roadkill.
Hey. Stinky. Kitchen's closed.

Hold it --
Hey, Sammy, whaddayasay we work this out?? Peacefully. I'm not a great shot, but --
"The Samaritan" here, uses really big bullets, so whadyasay we work this out?
That's all for you, Sammy.
Red -- you need to hear the rest of the information --
Nah -- he's taken care of.
See? I don't like that --
Skip to the end, willya?  How do I kill it -- ?

Don't tell me, it's Zeppo.

-- Then load this.

Lemme go ask --

Good. Stay here.
Waiting for me, Sammy?
Uh-oh -- between a rock and a hard place --
Aw, crap --
Hey! Hey! I'm on your side!!

Screw you.
I'm fireproof.

Myers??? How's your arm?
I just fried Stinky. Tell Father I'll be home. He shouldn't wait up.
No, no, no, it's fine: I do my job, I take a break.
Myers?
Goodbye.

Just a scratch.
I wanted to see you.
We miss you at the Bureau. Abe's crazier every day. And Father's still mad at me --
Come back, Liz. Come back. I --
The Nanny Squad.
Goodnight, then.
Yeah, I gotta go, too. Lots to do --
What took you so long?
What are you, a Boy Scout?
Could've fooled me. Go away.
This -- ? This is nothing. You know what'll kill me?
Her.
I'm lucky that way.
Don't worry. I'll get him soon enough --

Me?? C'mon --
Oh, stop that --
Damn! Be careful, there --
I dunno, maybe five seconds -- ow!
That's right, Stud, hold me down.
Is it bad?

Well, let's see -- there was that moment, when I had a train on top of my head --
How many buildings does she have to burn? She belongs here!

Hey. You: think twice --

Rotten eggs and the safety of mankind.

My job.

Father -- I'm back. I'm back. I'm back.
I wasn't here. You died alone --
Hi.
I am.

But I can't.
I can promise you only two things...
Good.
